Class ProductBLL

java.lang.Object
BusinessLogic.ProductBLL
public class ProductBLL extends Object
Business Logic Layer class for handling Product-related operations.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Method Details

    • findById

      public Product findById(int id)
      Finds a product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the product ID to search for.
      Returns:
      the found Product.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no product is found with the given ID.

    • findByName

      public Product findByName(String name)
      Finds a product by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the product to search for.
      Returns:
      the found Product.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no product is found with the given name.

    • findAll

      public List<Product> findAll()
      Retrieves all products.
      Returns:
      a list of all Product objects.

    • insert

      public Product insert(String name, String description, String priceStr, String stockStr)
      Inserts a new product after validating the input fields.
      Parameters:
      name - the product name.
      description - the product description.
      priceStr - the price as a string (must be parsable to int).
      stockStr - the stock quantity as a string (must be parsable to int).
      Returns:
      the inserted Product.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any input is empty.
      NumberFormatException - if price or stock cannot be parsed to integer.
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails.

    • update

      public Product update(Product product)
      Updates an existing product after validation.
      Parameters:
      product - the Product to update.
      Returns:
      the updated Product.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails.

    • delete

      public void delete(int id)
      Deletes a product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the product ID to delete.

    • populateTable

      public void populateTable(List<Product> products, JTable productTable)
      Populates the given JTable with the provided list of products.
      Parameters:
      products - the list of products to display.
      productTable - the JTable to populate.
